title: New: Ajimal – This Human Joy
body:
Alongside **M O N E Y** and **Jamie Isaa**c, the North East’s very own **Ajimal** does disconsolate melancholy as well as anyone in the UK.

Having impressed on the pages of CitR before, it’s fantastic to have him back, with new track _This Human Joy_, a swirling, intoxicating number, that showcases the majestic, pensive side to **Ajimal**. For a song so sombre, it’s ultimately rather uplifting, and one of the finest tracks of 2013 thus far. Check it out below. (Premiered via [LOBF](http://www.thelineofbestfit.com/new-music/song-of-the-day/listen-ajimal-this-human-joy-best-fit-premiere-119330))
